actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to provide for the recomputation of the annuities of certain individuals retiring under the Policemen and Firemen's Retirement and Disability Act of the District of Columbia as a result of a disability and of the annuities of the survivors of such individuals.

summary.text: Directs the recomputation of any annuities received under the Policemen and Firemen's Retirement and Disability Act of the District of Columbia which were based on the retirement of an individual under such Act for a disability during the period beginning on October 12, 1975, and ending on June 19, 1976. Requires such recomputation as if such individual had retired on October 11, 1975. Directs the Mayor of the District of Columbia to make lump-sum payments to such individuals.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the recomputation of the annuities of certain individuals retiring under the Policemen and Firemen's Retirement and Disability Act of the District of Columbia as a result of a disability and of the annuities of the survivors of such individuals.
